Canvas

Canvas UI System

Canvas UI System

Canvas is a system of user interface elements and components for use across Mesosphere sites and products. Canvas defines stylistic guidelines for the design and structure of digital interfaces in an effort to ensure consistency in brand and interaction.

  • Buttons
    • Button Sizes
    • Button States
    • Button Types
      • Rounded
      • Stroke
      • Link
      • Combined
    • Button Inverse Styling

Buttons

Canvas adds support for a range of button states and sizes. Simply add the .button class to any <a> or <button> to get started.

Simple Button 
<a href="#" class="button">
  Simple Button
</a>

Button Sizes

By default, buttons display at a standard size, comparable to that of an input field. Four additional sizes are available: mini, small, large, and jumbo. Add classes .button-mini, .button-small, .button-large, and .button-jumbo respectively to each button to adjust it's size.

Jumbo Large Default Small Mini 
<!-- Button: Jumbo -->
<a href="#" class="button button-jumbo">
  Jumbo
</a>

<!-- Button: Large -->
<a href="#" class="button button-large">
  Large
</a>

<!-- Button: Default -->
<a href="#" class="button">
  Default
</a>

<!-- Button: Small -->
<a href="#" class="button button-small">
  Small
</a>

<!-- Button: Mini -->
<a href="#" class="button button-mini">
  Mini
</a>

Button States

You may wish to display more than the single button type, either to create separation in the importance of various actions or to communicate the state of an action or form. Button states make this super easy.

Default Primary Success Warning Danger 
<!-- Button: Default -->
<a href="#" class="button">
  Default
</a>

<!-- Button: Primary -->
<a href="#" class="button button-primary">
  Primary
</a>

<!-- Button: Success -->
<a href="#" class="button button-success">
  Success
</a>

<!-- Button: Warning -->
<a href="#" class="button button-warning">
  Warning
</a>

<!-- Button: Danger -->
<a href="#" class="button button-danger">
  Danger
</a>

Button Types

We realize that one button shape and style, even with it's available states, may not be enough for the unique needs of your project. This is why we've include a number of additional button types: rounded, stroke, link.

Rounded Button

Add the class .button-rounded to any .button element to display it with rounded caps.

Default Primary Success Warning Danger 
<!-- Button: Default -->
<a href="#" class="button button-rounded">
  Default
</a>

<!-- Button: Primary -->
<a href="#" class="button button-rounded button-primary">
  Primary
</a>

Stroke Button

Add the class .button-stroke to any .button element to display it with a thin outer stroke.

Default Primary Success Warning Danger 
<!-- Button: Default -->
<a href="#" class="button button-stroke">
  Default
</a>

<!-- Button: Primary -->
<a href="#" class="button button-stroke button-primary">
  Primary
</a>

Link Button

Add the class .button-link to any .button element to display it as "text-only", while retaining the exact size attributes of it's normal button counterpart.

Default Primary Success Warning Danger 
<!-- Button: Default -->
<a href="#" class="button button-link">
  Default
</a>

<!-- Button: Primary -->
<a href="#" class="button button-link button-primary">
  Primary
</a>

Combine Button Types

Want a stroke button that has rounded caps? Go ahead and combine button classes to yield interesting display combinations.

Default Primary Success Warning Danger 
<!-- Button: Default -->
<a href="#" class="button button-stroke button-rounded">
  Default
</a>

<!-- Button: Primary -->
<a href="#" class="button button-stroke button-rounded button-primary">
  Primary
</a>

Inverse Styling

Add the class .inverse to any .button element to leverage inverse styling.

Default Primary Success Warning Danger
Default Primary Success Warning Danger
Default Primary Success Warning Danger 
<a href="#" class="button button-inverse">
  Default
</a>
